TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供有关安全失败的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况数据的运行状况事件类型，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 当安全操作失败时，将使用类。The class is used when a security operation fails. 这是一个用于 Web 请求的 URL 授权失败的示例。An example of this is a failed URL authorization for a Web request. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 配置为 针对以下功能引发事件：By default, ASP.NET is configured to raise the event for the following features: - 文件授权。File authorization. ASP.NET 仅当 Windows 标识与请求关联时，才会尝试文件授权。ASP.NET attempts file authorization only when a Windows Identity is associated with the request. 相关事件审核代码为 。The related event audit code is . - URL 授权。URL authorization. 这可控制未经授权的访问 URL 资源的尝试。This governs unauthorized attempts to access a URL resource. 由于匿名身份验证失败在大多数情况下是可接受的，因此不会审核匿名用户的失败尝试。Failed attempts by an anonymous user are not audited, because anonymous authentication failure is acceptable in most circumstances. 相关事件审核代码为 。The related event audit code is . - 一般未处理或安全的未处理条件。Generic unhandled or security unhandled conditions. 下面是与这些条件相关的事件代码列表：The following is a list of the event codes related to these conditions: - - - - - 引发事件时，ASP.NET 运行状况监视会递增相关的 "审核失败事件" 性能计数器，然后检查 `healthMonitoring` 配置节以确定是否有任何提供程序订阅该事件。When a event is raised, ASP.NET health monitoring increments the related Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter and then checks the `healthMonitoring` configuration section to determine whether any providers subscribe to the event. 如果提供程序订阅该事件，则 ASP.NET 会将事件调度到它们以进行处理。If providers subscribe to the event, ASP.NET dispatches the event to them for processing. > [!NOTE] > 若要在系统监视器中查看 "引发的审核失败事件" 性能计数器 (PerfMon) ，请在 "**添加计数器**" 窗口中，选择 "**性能对象**" 下拉列表中的 " **ASP.NET** "，选择 "**引发的审核失败事件**" 性能计数器，然后单击 "**添加**" 按钮。To view the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window, select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the **Audit Failure Events Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档中的 [使用系统监视器 (PerfMon) 与 ASP.NET 应用程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) 。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参见 "示例" 部分。For an example of deriving from the class, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生，以创建自定义审核事件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#1)] 以下配置摘录显示了如何启用 ASP.NET 以使用 事件。The following configuration excerpt shows how to enable ASP.NET to use the event. ``` ```

para.span: 格式化要显示的自定义事件信息时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来创建的实例 ，但你可以在实现继承自此类的事件类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在类中调用此构造函数 `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` 。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来创建的实例 ，但你可以在实现继承自此类的事件类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在类中调用此构造函数 `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` 。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 递增“引发的审核失败事件”性能计数器。

span.span: Increments the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks "引发的审核失败事件" 性能计数器跟踪自应用程序启动以来引发的失败审核事件数。The Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter tracks the number of failed audit events raised since the application started. 此方法还调用 parent 方法，这会递增引发的事件计数器。This method also calls the parent method, which increments the Events Raised counter. 此计数器跟踪引发的事件总数。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中查看这些性能计数器，请在 " **添加计数器** " 窗口中选择 " **ASP.NET** "，从 " **性能对象** " 下拉列表中选择要查看的性能计数器，然后单击 " **添加** " 按钮。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 上的 IIS 文档中的 [使用系统监视器 (PerfMon) 与 ASP.NET 应用程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) 。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
